ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful to Mr. Zhang Wen and Mr. Lai Changhong from Sichuan Provincial Institute of Forestry Survey for their assistance in the field data collections; We also thank colleagues at Forestry Department of Sichuan Province and Institute of Geographic Sciences and Natural Resources, the Chinese Academy of Sciences, for assistance in the field data collections and processing; This study was funded by the Project on Forest Carbon Monitoring and Accounting Project (2009-204) from the Forestry Department of Sichuan Province and The Nature Conservancy (TNC).
